CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 5 reads: "11. Attractive Catherine Curtis, hostess in the Metropolitan Bottling Company Pepsi-Cola booth"
TitMainTitle: Catherine Curtis standing behind Pepsi-Cola booth in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
